title: 2 BED / 1 BATH *** NEAR PROSPECT PARK
posting_body: ['No broker fee', 'Ready for asap move in date', 'Text Lihi @ 3477484234 w/ your move in date if interested :)', 'Modern renovated spacious 2/3 bedroom with exposed brick!', 'Building with shared laundry, rooftop and backyard!', '–', 'Located on Saint Johns Pl and Rogers Ave, on historic tree lined block in prime Crown Heights super close to the 2/3/4/5 train lines at Franklin Ave stop or A C train at Nostrand Ave stop Brooklyn museum, Prospect Park, and al the Franklin ave dining, bars, and night life close by!', '3 Spacious bedrooms with windows and super closets, Central air and heat, Video intercom system, hardwood flooring, modern kitchen with stainless steal appliances, bathroom with tub and shower, Guarantors Accepted, Pets Allowed * Upon approval, , shared courtyard / backyard, shared rooftop, Laundry Room in building, Showing by appointment – No broker fee']
